text: Tadeusz Bafia (born 18 September 1964) is a Polish skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1988 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Poland Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1988 Winter Olympics Category:People from Nowy Targ Category:Sportspeople from Lesser Poland Voivodeship
title: Tadeusz Bafia
